explains: v. 划；使成行；争吵（row的现在分词）
wordGroup: in a row 连续；成一长行
in row 行内的；在行内
death row 死囚牢房（等于death house）
row over v. 从容胜过；一路领先
row out 使划得精疲力尽
row house 墙壁相连成排的房屋

sentences.en: He had to stop rowing to bail water out of the boat.
sentences.cn: 他不得不停止划船，把船里的水舀出去。

sentences.en: I've seen some fairly big rowing boats.
sentences.cn: 我看到过一些相当大的划艇。

sentences.en: "It's about your rowing, I suppose," said the Rat, with an innocent air.
sentences.cn: “我猜，是关于你划船的事吧。”水鼠兰特装出一副无辜的神气说。
